maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/72/sett.orig: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/72/sett.text: Un des arbres malades. Appliquez le \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] pour le guérir.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/221/set.orig: Can't you see I'm in the middle of something here?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/221/set.text: Vous voyez pas que je suis occupé là ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/221/set.orig: Still in the middle of something.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/255/set.orig: Oh dang it, I fell asleep again.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/255/set.text: Oh, mince. Je me suis encore endormi.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/255/set.orig: Sorry for startling you. Is this for me?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/255/set.text: Désolé de vous avoir surpris. C'est pour moi ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Blue haired Spheromancer!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus !
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.note: de is not gendered this time ? i'm keeping the gendering from before.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: So we meet again!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: On se rencontre à nouveau !
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.note: Nos routes se croisent à nouveau ? or maybe this is used later.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Mon Dieu, not this guy again~
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Mon Dieu, encore~ ce type.
... Salut !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: I see your level remains as \c[1]UNACCEPTABLE\c[0] as it has been before!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Je vois que ton niveau reste toujours aussi \c[1]INACCEPTABLE\c[0] qu'avant !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Why do you even care so much about this...\.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu en as tellement quelque chose à... ?\.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: AGAIN, SHE IS \c[1]LEVEL \v[player.level]\c[0]!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: ENCORE UNE FOIS, ELLE EST \c[1]NIVEAU \v[player.level]\c[0] !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: EVERYBODY SHOULD CARE ABOUT THIS!!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: TOUT LE MONDE DEVRAIT S'EN PRÉOCCUPER !!

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: This game has \c[1]RULES\c[0]!!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Ce jeu a des \c[1]RÈGLES\c[0] bon sang !!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.note: de has schiesslich, oh, and the feminine pun is accidental.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Anyway...
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Quoi qu'il en soit...

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Good!\. I see your level is now in an acceptable range.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Ah, bien !\. Je vois que ton niveau est finalement dans un intervalle acceptable.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: As if that one level would have made a big difference.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Comme si un seul niveau aurait changé quelque chose.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: However!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Mais !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Your previous actions have not been forgotten!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Tes méfaits précédents n'ont pas été oubliés !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Being a cheater is bad as it is.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Être une tricheuse est déjà suffisamment scandaleux comme ça.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: But seeing a \c[3]Spheromancer\c[0] displaying such dishonest behavior!\. It breaks my heart!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Mais voir une \c[3]Spheromanceuse\c[0] avoir un comportement aussi malhonnête !\. Ça me fend le cœur !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: ...What?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: ... Hein ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: We Spheromancers are a noble, yet unappreciated class!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Nous, les Spheromancers, sommes une classe noble, bien que sous-appréciée !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: I can't allow a player like you to further damage our reputation!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Je ne peux pas permettre à une joueuse comme toi de venir tacher notre réputation !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Wait...\. You're a Spheromancer, too?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Attends...\. T'es aussi un Spheromancer ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Why of course!\. Don't you see my striking crimson outfit?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Bien sûr que oui !\. Ne vois-tu pas mes spéctaculaires habits pourpres ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Pardon, I thought you were a Triblader with all that green and...\. pointy hair.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Pardon, j'ai cru que tu étais un Triblader avec tout ce vert et ces...\. cheveux en piques.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: It's my style.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: C'est mon style.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: It's plain to see that fashion is beyond your grasp.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: On voit bien que la mode te dépasse complètement.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Suuuure~
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Bien sûûûr~

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Anyway!\. I'm talking to you, blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Peu importe !\. C'est à toi que je parle, Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: I challenge you to a \c[3]duel\c[0]!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Je te mets au défi de me battre en \c[3]duel\c[0] !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Wait, what?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Attends, quoi ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Come on!\. We just started playing!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Allez !\. On vient juste de commencer à jouer !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Of course we won't do it right here and now.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Bien sûr, on ne le fera pas ici et pas maintenant.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Let's have our duel at the \c[3]entrance of Bergen Trail\c[0]!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Faisons notre duel à \c[3]l'entrée du \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0] !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: I'll test your skills properly - to make sure you don't use any more dishonest methods!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Je testerais tes compétences minutieusement lors de l'épreuve - pour m'assurer, que tu n'utilises aucune méthode déloyale !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Ha...\. you really think that's a good idea?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Ha...\. tu crois vraiment que c'est une bonne idée ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Trust me you haven't seen \c[1]the worst of it\c[0] yet.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Crois-moi, tu n'as pas encore vu le \c[1]pire\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Well she \c[1]is level \v[player.level]\c[0]. So you can already guess how this will play out.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Oui bon, elle \c[1]est niveau \v[player.level]\c[0]. Donc tu peux déjà deviner comment ça va finir.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Are you serious?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: T'es sérieux ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Do you accept, blue-haired Spheromancer?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Acceptes-tu mon défi, Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Good!\. I'll be waiting for you!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Bien !\. Je t'attendrais !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: And off he goes again.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Et le revoilà parti.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: I'm sure this will be a lot of \c[1]fun to watch\c[0]!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Je suis sûre que ça va être très \c[1]amusant à regarder\c[0] !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: You beating that guy to a pulp.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: De te regarder lui ratatiner la tronche à ce type.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: But I'd really like to level up a bit before that, too. If that's okay!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Mais avant j'aimerais bien monter un peu en niveau, si c'est OK pour toi !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Are you sure it's okay to accept his challenge just like that?
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Tu es sûre que c'est une bonne idée d'accepter son défi comme ça ?

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: D'accord.\. It's your choice.
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: D'accord.\. C'est ton choix.

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Then let's make sure you're well prepared!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Alors faisons en sorte que tu sois bien préparée !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: I want you to kick this guy's derrière!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Je veux que tu lui bottes le derrière à ce mec !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Come on, let's train!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Allez, entraînons-nous !

maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.orig: Apollo challenged you to a duel and waits for you at the entrance of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0]. Be prepared!
maps/autumn/path-2.json/entities/257/set.text: Apollo vous a provoqué en duel et vous attend à l'entrée du \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]. Soyez prêt !
